item.title: Unprecedented show of force...
item.description:
www.washingtontimes.com
Police are scouring the internet for clues about plans for mayhem, workers are putting up chain link holding pens around Virginia’s picturesque Capitol Square, and one lawmaker even plans to hide in a safe house in advance of what’s expected to be an unprecedented show of force by gun-rights activists.

item.title: 'New Light of God' cult sacrifices 7 in jungle...
item.description:
www.washingtontimes.com
Bibles rest on a wooden altar next to percussion instruments - a guiro and a drum - in the room where a religious sect allegedly forced a pregnant woman and five of her children to walk through fire in this remote hamlet.

item.title: The Policing of the American Porch...
item.description:
www.nytimes.com
Ring offers a front-door view of a country where millions of Amazon customers use Amazon cameras to watch Amazon contractors deliver Amazon packages.

item.title: Hoverboarding dentist found guilty of 'unlawful dental acts'...
item.description:
www.nbcnews.com
Video captured Seth Lookhart extracting the tooth of a sedated patient as he rode a hoverboard.
